payment-list.title: Список заявок на закрытие счета или вклада

message.text: Конечная дата должна быть больше либо равна начальной

payment-list.hql-query: select claim from com.rssl.phizic.business.documents.BusinessDocumentBase claim where claim.owner.id = :loginId and claim.formName in ('DepositClosingClaim', 'AccountClosingClaim') and (:state_list is null or :state_list = '' or claim.state.code in (:state)) and (:fromDate is null or claim.dateCreated >= :fromDate) and (:toDate is null or claim.dateCreated <= :toDate ) and (:claimType is null or :claimType = '' or claim.formName = :claimType) order by claim.dateCreated desc, claim.changed desc, claim.id desc
